question: Why Free + Gas?
answer: This is a project of passion and fun, we are building this for the frends not the monies.

question: When Mint?
answer: The first drop will be coming soon, follow us on twitter with notifications on, and get in discord to get whitelisted.

question: Why Such Small Drops?
answer: We wanted to just start doing smaller batches and rotating the themes to keep fresh new Lil Bruvs coming.

question: What is a Drop?
answer: Each time we release new Lil Bruvs they will have an attribute going up.

question: How many Lil Bruvs per Drop?
answer: Batch sizes may steadily increase as the community grows but will be starting at 400 Lil Bruvs for the first three drops.

question: What is a Set?
answer: Each drop will have a Set attribute. The set will be the theme of the drop. The first three will all be “Base Set” as shown in our teasers. We are holding a community vote and releasing teasers for what theme to drop next.

question: What Network is This On?
answer: We will be launching on ETH. We are evaluating L2s to potentially migrate to in the future and also want to get community feedback on possibly doing some drops on other chains.

question: What Will the Total Collection Size Be?
answer: We are hoping to continue drops on going and have the collection size always going. Since each new set and drop will be an attribute it will be clear which Lil Bruvs are coming from later sets likely making some of the earlier ones more valuable to their holders.

question: Any Utility in Holding a Lil Bruv?
answer: Early benefits will be in collaborations and whitelist spot raffles for holders with other upcoming NFT projects. We will be doing holder minting periods in future drops and some holder only drops. We will also be holding community voting for holders on things like future set themes, batch sizes, and more.

question: One of Ones You Say?
answer: We will be creating some special one of one Lil Bruvs that will go up with 24 hour auction bidding. Half of all those proceeds go to the community wallet for collaborations, giveaways and road map goals.

question: What is the Royalty and Future Mint Proceeds Going Towards?
answer: While we don’t expect much if any at all for awhile in royalty % and minting is planned to be free until community voting changes that. Half of all proceeds from the 10% royalties and minting will be going into a community wallet to be used for building our team, collaborations, raffles, and the planned launch pad.
